message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $900000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. I'm willing to compromise, though. I can offer it to you for $850000. This is still a great deal, considering the product's value to you. I'm open to further negotiation, but I'm not willing to go below this price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $825000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great deal considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still not convinced that $825000 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you at $775000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $775000. However, I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $800000, which is my minimum acceptable price. This is the last time I'm willing to negotiate, and I'm confident that you'll see the value in this offer.

I appreciate your last concession, Alice. However, I'm still not willing to pay $800000. I'm willing to meet you at $775000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to pay. I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.

I understand that you're firm on the price, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $775000. I'm willing to make one final offer: I'll meet you at $795000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm confident that it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $795000. I'm willing to meet you at $780000, which is the absolute lowest price I'm willing to pay. I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
